Articles.Content:
I am doing it for art class at my school (first year the school has had an art class).

It is surprising they allowed it considering the teachers all believe in demons, witches, and say space travel is bad.

I will put some pictures of it on here (but I will ask for it to be removed it gets submitted for an art constest).

It is of ÃÅ¾Ãâ‚¬Ã‘ÂÃÂµÃÂº (Opsek to those illiterate in Russian), ÃÂ¡ÃÂ¾Ã‘Å½ÃÂ· (Soyuz to those illiterate in Russian), and Mars One.

- - - Updated - - -

Don't do Mars One. It's a scam. Do the Orion MPCV instead.

Also Soyuz will be replaced by the PPTS, do that.
Mars one is fake/scam. Don't do it

I would like to put in the third bit of advice in the same vein, mars one is a scam, a really, really big scam that has gone nowhere beyond some pretty designs and a website asking you for your money. Do the Orion MPCV or the Mars Semi-Direct concept, both of which have a larger chance of being done than Mars One.

Instead of Mars One, go for the SpaceX project. As "big" and way more interressing in any point of view. And they already have some interressing proved functional rockets, and some manned ships prototypes. (Dragon and Dragon V2), and some interressing concepts (reusable first stage)
Looks good, but do Orion cislunar instead of (fake) Mars One.

It is surprising they allowed it considering the teachers all believe in demons, witches, and say space travel is bad.

Wait... in North Carolina?

I like a good joke about the South, but that's ridiculous. I might expect those attitudes in rural Tanzania or something, but that's crazy for the US.

Wait... in North Carolina?

I like a good joke about the South, but that's ridiculous. I might expect those attitudes in rural Tanzania or something, but that's crazy for the US.

I disagree, people like that exist. Nobody can educate them ,they are too far down the rabbit hole.
